705    /**
706     * factory method to create a deep copy of Quote
707     * @param template instance to be copied
708     * @return copy instance
709     */
710    @Nullable
711    public static Quote deepCopy(@Nullable final Quote template) {
712        if (template == null) {
713            return null;
714        }
715        QuoteImpl instance = new QuoteImpl();
716        instance.setId(template.getId());
717        instance.setVersion(template.getVersion());
718        instance.setCreatedAt(template.getCreatedAt());
719        instance.setLastModifiedAt(template.getLastModifiedAt());
720        instance.setKey(template.getKey());
721        instance.setLastModifiedBy(
722            com.commercetools.api.models.common.LastModifiedBy.deepCopy(template.getLastModifiedBy()));
723        instance.setCreatedBy(com.commercetools.api.models.common.CreatedBy.deepCopy(template.getCreatedBy()));
724        instance.setQuoteRequest(
725            com.commercetools.api.models.quote_request.QuoteRequestReference.deepCopy(template.getQuoteRequest()));
726        instance.setStagedQuote(
727            com.commercetools.api.models.staged_quote.StagedQuoteReference.deepCopy(template.getStagedQuote()));
728        instance.setCustomer(com.commercetools.api.models.customer.CustomerReference.deepCopy(template.getCustomer()));
729        instance.setCustomerGroup(
730            com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupReference.deepCopy(template.getCustomerGroup()));
731        instance.setValidTo(template.getValidTo());
732        instance.setSellerComment(template.getSellerComment());
733        instance.setBuyerComment(template.getBuyerComment());
734        instance.setStore(com.commercetools.api.models.store.StoreKeyReference.deepCopy(template.getStore()));
735        instance.setLineItems(Optional.ofNullable(template.getLineItems())
736                .map(t -> t.stream()
737                        .map(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.LineItem::deepCopy)
738                        .collect(Collectors.toList()))
739                .orElse(null));
740        instance.setCustomLineItems(Optional.ofNullable(template.getCustomLineItems())
741                .map(t -> t.stream()
742                        .map(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.CustomLineItem::deepCopy)
743                        .collect(Collectors.toList()))
744                .orElse(null));
745        instance.setTotalPrice(com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney.deepCopy(template.getTotalPrice()));
746        instance.setTaxedPrice(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.TaxedPrice.deepCopy(template.getTaxedPrice()));
747        instance.setShippingAddress(
748            com.commercetools.api.models.common.Address.deepCopy(template.getShippingAddress()));
749        instance.setBillingAddress(com.commercetools.api.models.common.Address.deepCopy(template.getBillingAddress()));
750        instance.setInventoryMode(template.getInventoryMode());
751        instance.setTaxMode(template.getTaxMode());
752        instance.setTaxRoundingMode(template.getTaxRoundingMode());
753        instance.setTaxCalculationMode(template.getTaxCalculationMode());
754        instance.setCountry(template.getCountry());
755        instance.setShippingInfo(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ShippingInfo.deepCopy(template.getShippingInfo()));
756        instance.setPaymentInfo(com.commercetools.api.models.order.PaymentInfo.deepCopy(template.getPaymentInfo()));
757        instance.setShippingRateInput(
758            com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ShippingRateInput.deepCopy(template.getShippingRateInput()));
759        instance.setItemShippingAddresses(Optional.ofNullable(template.getItemShippingAddresses())
760                .map(t -> t.stream()
761                        .map(com.commercetools.api.models.common.Address::deepCopy)
762                        .collect(Collectors.toList()))
763                .orElse(null));
764        instance.setDirectDiscounts(Optional.ofNullable(template.getDirectDiscounts())
765                .map(t -> t.stream()
766                        .map(com.commercetools.api.models.cart.DirectDiscount::deepCopy)
767                        .collect(Collectors.toList()))
768                .orElse(null));
769        instance.setCustom(com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields.deepCopy(template.getCustom()));
770        instance.setQuoteState(template.getQuoteState());
771        instance.setState(com.commercetools.api.models.state.StateReference.deepCopy(template.getState()));
772        instance.setPurchaseOrderNumber(template.getPurchaseOrderNumber());
773        instance.setBusinessUnit(
774            com.commercetools.api.models.business_unit.BusinessUnitKeyReference.deepCopy(template.getBusinessUnit()));
775        return instance;
776    }
777
778    /**
779     * builder factory method for Quote
780     * @return builder
781     */
782    public static QuoteBuilder builder() {
783        return QuoteBuilder.of();
784    }
785
786    /**
787     * create builder for Quote instance
788     * @param template instance with prefilled values for the builder
789     * @return builder
790     */
791    public static QuoteBuilder builder(final Quote template) {
792        return QuoteBuilder.of(template);
793    }
794
795    /**
796     * accessor map function
797     * @param <T> mapped type
798     * @param helper function to map the object
799     * @return mapped value
800     */
801    default <T> T withQuote(Function<Quote, T> helper) {
802        return helper.apply(this);
803    }
804
805    public static com.commercetools.api.models.common.ReferenceTypeId referenceTypeId() {
806        return com.commercetools.api.models.common.ReferenceTypeId.QUOTE;
807    }

810     * gives a TypeReference for usage with Jackson DataBind
811     * @return TypeReference
812     */
813    public static com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<Quote> typeReference() {
814        return new com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<Quote>() {
815            @Override

818            }
819        };
